name: Busy Little Bee
description:
BUSY LITTLE BEE

Help our little wild bee and her friends to pollinate lots of flowers. Watch out to avoid the pesticide and other more natural enemies.

If you're playing mobile: Fly to the flower's pistil to pollinate. When you're a ladybug, reach the lice to eat them. The honeybee must deliver pollen to her hive - otherwise she can't continue collecting. Pesticide or wasp contact makes her lose her harvest.

PC-Gameplay: Navigation via arrow-keys or a-s-w-d. Space bar to pollinate, eat lice or deliver pollen to your hive.

Currently I'm working on another level - we all love bumblebees, right? If you have ideas or wishes I could implement, please let me know.
